lead_paragraph: Google will raise the salaries of gay and lesbian employees whose partners receive domestic partner benefits, to compensate them for a tax they pay that heterosexual married couples do not.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Google will raise the salaries of gay and lesbian employees whose partners receive domestic partner benefits, to compensate them for a tax they pay that heterosexual married couples do not.

headline.main: Google to Add Pay to Cover a Tax for Same-Sex Benefits
headline.print_headline: To Cover Tax, Google to Add To Gays’ Pay
